metadata.selection_criteria: High-value datasets for quantitative trading strategies with proven signal generation capability

datasets.description: 每日股票收盤價格，基礎技術分析指標
datasets.rationale: Essential baseline - all strategies need price data for position sizing, return calculation, and technical analysis. Used in 100% of observed strategies.

datasets.description: 每日股票開盤價格
datasets.rationale: Enables gap analysis and intraday momentum strategies. Useful for detecting overnight information events and market sentiment shifts.

datasets.description: 每日股票最高價格
datasets.rationale: Required for volatility indicators (ATR, Bollinger Bands) and breakout strategies. Identifies intraday resistance levels.

datasets.description: 每日股票最低價格
datasets.rationale: Required for volatility indicators (ATR, Bollinger Bands) and support level identification. Essential for risk management.

datasets.description: 每日成交股票數量，流動性指標
datasets.rationale: Critical liquidity filter - screens out low-volume stocks prone to manipulation. Used in 90% of observed strategies for risk management.

datasets.description: 每日成交總金額，流動性指標
datasets.rationale: Primary liquidity filter - ensures strategies only trade liquid stocks (>30M TWD threshold). Prevents slippage and enables position sizing. Used in 95% of champion strategies.

datasets.description: 每日成交筆數，交易活躍度指標
datasets.rationale: Measures market participation and investor interest. High trade count indicates active trading and better price discovery.

datasets.description: 每日價格變動
datasets.rationale: Enables momentum strategies and short-term trend detection. Useful for identifying strong price movements.

datasets.description: 每日價格變動百分比
datasets.rationale: Normalized momentum signal - allows cross-sectional comparison of price movements. Essential for ranking-based strategies.

datasets.description: 每日成交均價
datasets.rationale: VWAP proxy - indicates average execution price and helps identify intraday anomalies. Useful for mean reversion strategies.

datasets.description: 前15大券商分點買進金額，籌碼面強勢指標
datasets.rationale: Smart money signal - top brokers often represent institutional or informed traders. Strong buy activity predicts future price appreciation.

datasets.description: 前15大券商分點賣出金額，籌碼面弱勢指標
datasets.rationale: Smart money exit signal - top broker selling indicates distribution phase. Helps avoid stocks under institutional selling pressure.

datasets.description: 券商買賣超平衡程度，籌碼集中度指標
datasets.rationale: Measures ownership concentration - imbalanced buying suggests accumulation. Effective factor for identifying stocks with improving supply-demand dynamics.

datasets.description: 券商淨買超/賣超數量
datasets.rationale: Quantifies broker sentiment - positive net buying indicates bullish positioning. Complements balance index for comprehensive broker analysis.

datasets.description: 完整券商分點買賣超數據，可分析主力動向
datasets.rationale: Raw broker data - enables custom aggregations and broker-specific analysis. Allows identification of specific broker trading patterns.

datasets.description: 外資持股數量餘額，法人籌碼指標
datasets.rationale: Foreign ownership signal - high foreign holdings correlate with quality stocks. Tracks long-term institutional commitment.

datasets.description: 外資持股比例，法人青睞度指標
datasets.rationale: Normalized foreign ownership - allows cross-sectional comparison. High ratios indicate institutional confidence and research coverage.

datasets.id: institutional_investors_trading_summary:外陸資買賣超股數(不含外資自營商)
datasets.description: 外資主力每日買賣超統計
datasets.rationale: Primary institutional flow signal - used in 80% of successful strategies. Foreign buying predicts next-day returns. Excludes proprietary trading for purer signal.

datasets.description: 投信每日買賣超統計，本土法人動向
datasets.rationale: Domestic institutional signal - investment trusts often move markets in Taiwan. Strong buying indicates local fund flows.

datasets.description: 自營商每日買賣超統計
datasets.rationale: Dealer positioning signal - proprietary trading desks have information advantage. Net buying suggests bullish dealer positioning.

datasets.description: 外資+投信+自營商總和
datasets.rationale: Aggregate institutional signal - combined buying power of all three institutions. Strong consensus signal when all three align.

datasets.description: 外資買賣超力道指標
datasets.rationale: Momentum-adjusted foreign flow - captures intensity of foreign buying. Stronger signal than raw volume.

datasets.description: 投信買賣超力道指標
datasets.rationale: Momentum-adjusted investment trust flow - measures conviction of domestic institutions. Complements foreign strength.

datasets.description: 融資餘額，散戶情緒指標
datasets.rationale: Retail leverage signal - high margin indicates retail speculation. Useful contrarian indicator when extremely high.

datasets.description: 融資使用率，過熱警示指標
datasets.rationale: Normalized margin usage - detects overheated stocks. >50% usage often precedes corrections. Risk management signal.

datasets.description: 股東權益報酬率，獲利能力核心指標
datasets.rationale: Premier quality factor - ROE >15% consistently identifies profitable companies. Used in 70% of champion strategies with 4-quarter smoothing to reduce noise.

datasets.description: 營業利益率，本業獲利能力
datasets.rationale: Core business profitability - isolates operating performance from financial engineering. High margins indicate competitive moats.

datasets.description: 稅後淨利率，綜合獲利能力
datasets.rationale: Bottom-line profitability - comprehensive measure including all expenses. Complements operating margin for complete profit picture.

datasets.description: 營收年增率，成長性指標
datasets.rationale: Growth signal - revenue acceleration predicts earnings growth. Especially powerful when combined with high ROE.

datasets.description: 每股盈餘，基本面核心指標
datasets.rationale: Fundamental valuation anchor - EPS growth drives long-term returns. Essential for earnings momentum strategies.

datasets.description: 股價淨值比，估值指標
datasets.rationale: Valuation filter - low P/E (<15) identifies value opportunities. Used in 60% of strategies to avoid overvalued growth traps.

datasets.description: 市價與淨值比較，價值投資指標
datasets.rationale: Asset-based valuation - P/B <1.5 indicates potential value. Effective factor for identifying undervalued stocks with solid balance sheets.

datasets.description: 現金股利殖利率，配息能力
datasets.rationale: Income signal - high yield (>4%) indicates cash generation and shareholder returns. Defensive quality factor.

datasets.description: 月營收年增率，成長趨勢
datasets.rationale: High-frequency fundamental signal - monthly data provides early growth warnings. Used in 85% of successful strategies for timely entry/exit.

datasets.description: 月營收月增率，短期動能
datasets.rationale: Short-term momentum signal - month-over-month changes detect inflection points. Complements YoY growth for comprehensive trend analysis.

datasets.description: 季度財報每股盈餘，詳細獲利數據
datasets.rationale: Quarterly EPS - more granular than annual EPS. Enables earnings momentum and surprise strategies.

datasets.description: 季度財報損益表，詳細獲利數據
datasets.rationale: Complete income statement - enables calculation of custom profitability metrics. Provides revenue, COGS, operating expenses breakdown.

datasets.description: 季度財報資產負債表，財務健全度
datasets.rationale: Financial health data - enables debt ratio, current ratio, asset quality analysis. Critical for risk screening.

datasets.description: 季度現金流量表，資金運用狀況
datasets.rationale: Cash generation analysis - operating cash flow validates earnings quality. Identifies companies with strong cash conversion.

datasets.description: 公司市值，規模指標
datasets.rationale: Size factor - market cap >5B TWD filters for institutional-grade stocks. Larger stocks have better liquidity and lower manipulation risk.

datasets.description: RSI技術指標，超買超賣判斷
datasets.rationale: Momentum/reversal signal - RSI <30 indicates oversold (mean reversion), RSI >70 overbought. Widely used for entry/exit timing.

datasets.description: KD指標，動能分析
datasets.rationale: Short-term momentum - K/D crossovers signal trend changes. Effective for swing trading strategies.

datasets.description: MACD指標，趨勢與動能
datasets.rationale: Trend following signal - MACD crossovers identify trend changes. Histogram measures momentum strength.

datasets.description: 布林通道，波動率與支撐壓力
datasets.rationale: Volatility bands - price touching upper band indicates strength, lower band weakness. Mean reversion signal when bands squeeze.

datasets.description: ADX指標，趨勢強度判斷
datasets.rationale: Trend strength filter - ADX >25 indicates strong trend (trend-following works), ADX <20 range-bound (mean reversion better).

datasets.description: ATR指標，波動率測量
datasets.rationale: Volatility measure - used for position sizing and stop loss placement. High ATR requires smaller positions for risk control.

datasets.description: OBV指標，量價關係
datasets.rationale: Volume-price confirmation - rising OBV confirms uptrend. Divergences between OBV and price predict reversals.

datasets.description: CCI指標，價格偏離度
datasets.rationale: Overbought/oversold indicator - CCI >100 overbought, <-100 oversold. Effective for identifying extreme price deviations.

datasets.description: 威廉指標，超買超賣判斷
datasets.rationale: Momentum oscillator - similar to Stochastic but faster. %R <-80 oversold, >-20 overbought. Good for short-term reversals.

datasets.description: MFI指標，資金流向分析
datasets.rationale: Volume-weighted RSI - incorporates both price and volume. MFI >80 indicates buying pressure exhaustion, <20 selling exhaustion.
